sn47.20:1.2: ekam samayam bhagava sumbhesu viharati sedakam nama sumbhanam nigamo.
sn47.20:2.1: “Seyyathapi, bhikkhave, ‘janapadakalyani, janapadakalyani’ti kho, bhikkhave, mahajanakayo sannipateyya.
sn47.20:2.2: ‘Sa kho panassa janapadakalyani paramapasavini nacce, paramapasavini gite.
sn47.20:2.3: Janapadakalyani naccati gayati’ti kho, bhikkhave, bhiyyoso mattaya mahajanakayo sannipateyya.
sn47.20:2.4: Atha puriso agaccheyya jivitukamo amaritukamo sukhakamo dukkhappatikulo.
sn47.20:2.6: ‘ayam te, ambho purisa, samatittiko telapatto antarena ca mahasamajjam antarena ca janapadakalyaniya pariharitabbo.
sn47.20:2.7: Puriso ca te ukkhittasiko pitthito pitthito anubandhissati.
sn47.20:2.8: Yattheva nam thokampi chaddessati tattheva te siro patessati’ti.
sn47.20:2.10: api nu so puriso amum telapattam amanasikaritva bahiddha pamadam ahareyya”ti?
sn47.20:3.1: “Upama kho myayam, bhikkhave, kata atthassa vinnapanaya.
sn47.20:3.3: samatittiko telapattoti kho, bhikkhave, kayagataya etam satiya adhivacanam.
sn47.20:3.5: ‘kayagata sati no bhavita bhavissati bahulikata yanikata vatthukata anutthita paricita susamaraddha’ti.
